home.title: El Burro Solo Helper
home.play1: Play El Burro against Leon, the Solo opponent.
home.play2: This application replaced the deck of solo game round cards and helps managing the difficulty levels.

setupBot.title: Setup Leon
setupBot.soloFarmBoard: Place Leon’s solo farm board next to your play area. As usual, leave some space around it to place farm cards at the farm. Place Leon’s goods tokens as their supply next to their farm.
setupBot.goodsTokenSilver: Place 1 goods token and 2 silver on the matching storage spaces of Leon’s farm.
setupBot.farmCards: Draw farm cards to create Leon’s starting display. Draw cards one by one and place them as follows at their farm:
setupBot.farmCard1: Place the 1<sup>st</sup> card as a field (place 1 goods token on the storage space for goods tokens).
setupBot.farmCard23: Place the 2<sup>nd</sup> and 3<sup>rd</sup> cards as market barrows (in the left and center card slots).
setupBot.farmCard4: Place the 4<sup>th</sup> card as farm administration.
setupBot.supportMarker: Place 1 support marker with the prestige side face up next to Leon’s farm.
setupBot.stableBoard: Place Leon’s stable board next to the farm. Place the trough and milestone marker on the appropriate spaces. Leon starts with the trough marker on space “1”.
setupBot.soloFarmGoods: Place the 6 solo farm goods tiles on the spaces of the stable.
setupBot.specialSoloFarmCards: Shuffle the special solo farm cards and place them in a facedown draw stack next to the farm. Draw 3 cards and place them in a faceup row.
